title: Movable Feast
description: A feast whose date is computed relative to Easter.

id.description: A short unique identifier to be referenced.

key.description: Unique key for this movable feast.

yearNumber.description: Year number within the cycle, if applicable.

offsetFromEaster.description: Days offset from Easter (can be negative).

riteVersionId.description: Reference ID to the rite version.

localeId.description: Reference ID to the calendar locale.

rescheduledFromId.description: If transferred, ID of the original movable feast.

rescheduledToFixedId.description: If transferred to a fixed feast, its ID.
